entry.tran: 丹麦的;丹麦人的;丹麦语（或文化）的
entry.def: Danish means belonging or relating to Denmark, its people, its language, or culture.

entry.def: Danish is the language spoken in Denmark.

means.word_mean: 1. a Scandinavian language that is the official language of Denmark
2. light sweet yeast-raised roll usually filled with fruits or cheese
1. of or relating to or characteristic of Denmark or the Danes;
